Package ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham

Class RecentFiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.cgjennings.apps.arkham.RecentFiles
  • public class RecentFiles
extends Object
    The shared, global list of recently opened component and project files.
    Since:
    3.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int MAXIMUM_LIST_SIZE
      The maximum number of recent files that will be tracked.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void add​(File file)
      Adds a file to the recent file list.
      static void clear()
      Clears the list of recently used files.
      static boolean contains​(File file)
      Returns true if the specified file is a member of the list.
      static int getNumberOfFilesToDisplay()
      Returns the maximum number of files that the user wishes to include in the recent file list.
      static Iterator<File> iterator()
      Returns an iterator over the recent file list.
      static void remove​(File file)
      Removes a file from the list.
      static int size()
      Returns the number of files available in the list.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • MAXIMUM_LIST_SIZE

        public static final int MAXIMUM_LIST_SIZE
        The maximum number of recent files that will be tracked.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public static void add​(File file)
        Adds a file to the recent file list. If the file is already in the list, it is moved to the start.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to add to the list

      • remove

        public static void remove​(File file)
        Removes a file from the list. Has no effect if the file is not on the list.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to remove

      • contains

        public static boolean contains​(File file)
        Returns true if the specified file is a member of the list.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to check for
        Returns:
        true if the list contains the file

      • iterator

        public static Iterator<File> iterator()
        Returns an iterator over the recent file list.
        Returns:
        an iterator that returns that iterates over the file list in order from most recently used to least recently used

      • clear

        public static void clear()
        Clears the list of recently used files.

      • size

        public static int size()
        Returns the number of files available in the list. Note that this may not be the same number as the number that the user wishes to display.
        Returns:
        the number of available recent files
        See Also:
        getNumberOfFilesToDisplay()

      • getNumberOfFilesToDisplay

        public static int getNumberOfFilesToDisplay()
        Returns the maximum number of files that the user wishes to include in the recent file list. This will be a number between 0 and MAXIMUM_LIST_SIZE, inclusive.
        Returns:
        the maximum number of files displayed in the recent file list
